line_1: Must add to force of merit, force of bribes.
line_2: Those who would gain the votes of British tribes,

line_1: Fearing the Lash for taking Bribes,
line_2: My faithful Guide my Doom proscribes,

line_1: By Party warpt, or lull'd asleep by Bribes,
line_2: Hast thou not heard, that 'mongst our antient Tribes

line_1: Sunk not his stores. With smiles and powerful bribes
line_2: He gain'd the leaders of his neighbour tribes,

line_1: Turn your bright eyes, and shun the dangerous bribes;
line_2: Stay in your crystal chambers, silver tribes!
